/**
 * Include A Tag And A Unity Action
 * 包含一个标签和一个Action
 */
class UAction {
    constructor(tag, act) {
        if (tag == undefined) {
            tag = "";
        }
        if (act == undefined) {
            act = () => { };
        }
        this.tag = tag;
        this.act = act;
    }
}
exports.UAction = UAction;
